getRDFAsJsonTree

public org.json.JSONObject getRDFAsJsonTree(org.openrdf.model.URI value,
                                            org.openrdf.repository.Repository rep,
                                            int depth,
                                            int spread)
recursively computes the maxDepth-hop-neighbourhood of the current entity on the passed repository. For evaluation on the main repository, pass null as rep.

Parameters:
value - the central value of the graph to be computed
rep - repository on which the graph shall be computed
depth - number of hops to be computed
Returns:
A JSon representation of the content of the repository, or null if the repository contains no data
Throws:
org.json.JSONException
org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
